#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
 
 
int main(){
    int  t,n;
    cin>>t;
 
while(t--){
 
cin>>n;
int sum=(n*(n+1) )/2;
int sum2=0;
 
int arr[n];
for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {cin>>arr[n];sum2=sum2+arr[n];}
 
//cout<<sum<<endl<<sum2<<endl;
cout<<abs(sum2-sum)<<endl;
 
 
}
 
 
    return 0;
 
}
